name: Psi Booster
description: Adds 1D to the user's Psi rating for 1D hours. The basic psi-drug, booster is available in small one-dose pills. Booster increases an individual's available psionic strength. Additional doses have no effect if taken by a psionic within an hour. The drug-induced additional psionic strength will wane and disappear at the end of one hour.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
